sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of Nike ( NKE ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading down 0.2%.
Year to date, Nike registers a 36.6% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Exxon Mobil ( XOM ), trading down 2.3%.
Exxon Mobil is lower by about 18.8% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Caterpillar ( CAT ), trading down 2.1%, and Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 0.2% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
